Public Class Panel Inherits MobileControl Implements ITemplateable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: Provides a container for organizing controls in a mobile Web forms page.

span.span: Provides a container for organizing controls in a mobile Web forms page.

summary.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 面板是可以巢狀的容器控制項。Panels are container controls that can be nested. 在面板上設定的屬性會繼承該面板中所包含的控制項。Attributes set on a panel are inherited by the controls that are contained in that panel. 您可以使用工作面板任何下列功能：You can use a panel for any of the following functions: - 以邏輯方式群組控制項，以便可顯示或隱藏。Grouping controls logically so that they can be shown or hidden. - 定義為方便的容器，可建立或移除動態控制項。Defining a convenient container where controls can be created or removed dynamically. - 使用單一點套用樣式屬性，將一組控制項，藉由設定這些面板上。Using a single point to apply style attributes to a set of controls, by setting them on the panel. 由於樣式繼承套用至面板，面板設定屬性可以繼承該面板中所包含的控制項。Because style inheritance applies to panels, attributes that are set on a panel can be inherited by controls that are contained in that panel. - 資訊提供給 ASP.NET 網頁架構保持在一起，重新編頁時，哪些控制項。Providing information to the ASP.NET page framework about which controls to keep together when paginating. 根據預設，面板的內容都會保持在一起的頁面上。By default, the contents of a panel are kept together on a page. 您可以修改此行為，藉由設定面板的屬性。You can modify this behavior by setting the property for the panel. 您可以包含常值文字，以及其隨附的標記中的文字內容。You can include literal text together with its accompanying markup tags in the text contents of the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[內表單標記常值文字](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05e061ed-9916-4ece-bfc8-7bf131fe232e)。For more information, see [Literal Text Inside Form Markup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05e061ed-9916-4ece-bfc8-7bf131fe232e). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在頁面載入期間設定面板的屬性以及如何定義函式來管理面板的屬性，使其回應按選命令。The following code example demonstrates how to set properties for a panel during page load and how to define functions to manipulate properties for a panel so that they respond to command clicks. 頁面載入時，程式碼也會尋找並修改在第二個面板中的裝置特定內容範本內的標籤。At page load, the code also looks for and modifies a label within a device-specific content template in a second panel. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobilePanelSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePanelSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] 您也必須將此區段新增至您的 Web.config 檔案：You will also need to add this section to your Web.config file:

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用載入頁面時，找不到控制項的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to find a control when the page loads. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobilePanelSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePanelSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] 您也必須將此區段新增至您的 Web.config 檔案：You will also need to add this section to your Web.config file:

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表單重新編頁後，就會引發事件。The event is raised after form pagination occurs. > [!NOTE] > 即使屬性設定為`false`，如果表單的仍然可能發生分頁屬性設定。Even if the property is set to `false`, pagination can still occur if a form's property is set. > [!NOTE] > 若要允許的分頁控制項在表單中，您必須設定至`true`表單和面板中。To allow pagination in a control within a form, you must set to `true` in both the form and the panel. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例頁面的分頁就會在裝置上檢視時顯示包含多個控制項超出在單一頁面上的面板面板上允許使用者存取所有項目的方式編頁。The following code example, when viewed on a device that paginates the pages, shows how a panel containing more controls than will fit on one page is paginated to allow users access to all items on the panel. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobilePanelSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePanelSample/cs/Default2.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobilePanelSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePanelSample/vb/Default2.aspx#3)]
